_header: Here I am and forth I must
_description: A charm against enemies — nine lines

BodAsh1378.First Lines:
Here I ame and fourthe I mouste& in Ihesus criste is all my
                    trust…
BodAsh1378.Last Lines:
…In the name of the father & the sonneAnd the holly
                    goste

Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.

Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.

Luria,  Maxwell Sidney,  and  Richard L. Hoffman, eds.  
             Middle English Lyrics.
